name: Telepass S.p.A.
goal: Telepass S.p.A. is a company belonging to the Atlantia Group specialized in the electronic payment service on the highways from 1990 (initially as a department of Autostrade per l'Italia, then in 2008 it was established as a indepenent company). Currently, Telepass operates, as EETS provider, in Italy, France, Spain, Portugal, Austria, Denmark, Belgium and Poland. Besides the electronic toll collection, Telepass has also developed new offers regarding the electronic payment services for urban and extra-urban mobility,  car parking fees, street parking payment, access to restricted traffic areas in italian cities, and tickets for ferries. Telepass is expanding its scope to fuel, parking, car sharing, fine payments and other expenses related to mobility to be paid using a Telepass account.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Consumers, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
